pr_title: (0.20.0) CPU cache line size for Linux AArch64

timeline.bodyText: Why is the formatting here different than the PR for master?   Please also port 078394b over so this code exactly matches the master version
timeline.author: DanHeidinga

replies.bodyText:
Just a mistake copying my older local version to this commit.
Corrected.
replies.author: knn-k

timeline.message:
(0.20.0) CPU cache line size for Linux AArch64

This commit adds code to j9sysinfo_get_cache_info() so that Linux
AArch64 systems can answer the L1 data cache line size.

Signed-off-by: KONNO Kazuhiro <konno@jp.ibm.com>

(0.20.0) CPU cache line size for Linux AArch64

This commit adds code to j9sysinfo_get_cache_info() so that Linux
AArch64 systems can answer the L1 data cache line size.

Signed-off-by: KONNO Kazuhiro <konno@jp.ibm.com>
